categoryContent.title: Fonda 200 Weekend - Friday (9/27/19)
categoryContent.description: A-Verdi presents Patriot Sprint Tour (PST) plus PST heldover feature from May 25, Sunoco Modified Qualifying Races, Pro Stocks $1,000 to win, Street Stocks $500 to win presented by Roberts Towing & Recovery & Four Cylinder Cruisers

categoryContent.title: Bacon Town Showdown Friday Night
categoryContent.description:
Friday night's portion of the Inaugural Bacon Town Showdown presented by Greeley Trucking and the Martin County Pork Producers.
Mods, Stocks, Sportmods, Hobby's, & Sport Compacts.

categoryContent.title: 44th Annual Red Clay Classic Night 1
categoryContent.description: The Red Clay Classic has been a must see event in the north region for over 40 years, the first night will kick off with the traditional heat races for the WISSOTA Late Models, WISSOTA Modifieds, WISSOTA Super Stocks, and WISSOTA Midwest Modifieds.

categoryContent.title: Fonda 200 Weekend - Saturday (9/28/19)
categoryContent.description:
Fonda 200 paying $53,000 to win for Sunoco Modifieds, Modified Last Chance Races plus Crate 602 Sportsman $1,500 to win
(DTD XTRA) **Raindate - Sunday 9/29/19

categoryContent.title: 44th Annual Red Clay Classic Night 2
categoryContent.description: Championship night of the Red Clay Classic will conclude with b-mains for all the divisions and then championship features, see who will be crowned Red Clay Champions on the 44th edition of the Red Clay Classic at ABC Raceway, WISSOTA Late Models, WISSOTA Modifieds, WISSOTA Super Stocks, and WISSOTA Midwest Mods will all be in action.

categoryContent.title: NEW DATE ðŸ—“: $10,000-to-win Full Throttle SLM 100 (CTTV Bonus race)
categoryContent.description: Florida's best super late model racers tackle the unique Citrus County Speedway layout for 100 laps and the chance to win $10,000 in this early fall classic. This event is a bonus race and included for CARS Tour TV subscribers.

categoryContent.title: Bacon Town Showdown Saturday Night
categoryContent.description:
Saturday night's racing action of the inaugural Bacon Town Showdown presented by Greeley Trucking and the Martin County Pork Producers.
